programme.desc: Bir grup bilim insanı bir muzikali iyi yapan şeyi araştırıyor ve bir bilgisayar programı olan Android Lloyd Webberı yaratıyorlar. Ardından bu bilgisayar yaratıcılığı deneyi için besteciler ve aktorlerle çalışıyorlar.

programme.title: DIY Sci Clips: Make an Amazing Coloured T-Shirt
programme.desc: From walking on eggs to turning soda bottles into rockets: DIY SCI features jaw-dropping science experiments viewers can do at home.

programme.title: DIY Sci Clips
programme.desc: From walking on eggs to turning soda bottles into rockets: DIY SCI features jaw-dropping science experiments viewers can do at home.

programme.title: Bilimi Kendin Yap: Ürkutucu Bilim
programme.desc: Steve Spangler bilime dayalı sihirli efektlerle ve korkunç numaralarlar her gununuzu nasıl urkutucu bir hale donuştureceğinizi gosteriyor. uzerinden dumanlar çıkan içecek, doğa ustu kopukler ve sahte kanla nasıl bir zombi partisi duzenleyeceğinizi gosteriyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Mısır Bitkisi
programme.desc: Araştırmacılar, tarımsal ekosistemlerdeki çeşitliliği artırarak, mahsul verimini, kalitesini, esnekliğini ve tadını iyileştirmeye çalışıyorlar. Burada ki temel faktor, bitkiler ve yeraltı mikropları arasındaki etkileşimin anlaşılması.

programme.title: Futuris: Nukleer Tarama
programme.desc: Bir sırt çantasına sığacak kadar kuçuk bir 3D harita tarayıcı, buyuk yeraltı alanlarını gerçek zamanlı olarak haritalamak için geliştiriliyor. Saniyede 10 devir yapan hızlı sensorler, hareketli verileri de toplamaya imkan veriyor.

programme.title: Bilimi Kendin Yap: En Sevilen Deneyler
programme.desc: Steve Spangler elinizde tutabileceğiniz parlayan balonlar ve aklınızla dondurduğunuz su gibi en sevdiği deneylerden bazılarının sırlarını açıklıyor.

programme.title: Futuris: İyileştiren Zehirler
programme.desc: Kobra gibi zehirli hayvanlar tehlikelidir ama aynı zamanda hastalıkların tedavisini için yardımcı da olabiliyorlar. Araştırmacıların 203 farklı turden 4000 toksini çıkarıp, tanımlayıp, sınıflandırdıklarını gostereceğiz. Zehir bazlı ilaçlar yoksa bir tedavi mi?

programme.title: Futuris: Koca Çanta Teorisi
programme.desc: Temiz su bazı yerlerde bol miktarken bazı yerlerde değildir. Acaba temiz suyu hesaplı bir yolla ihtiyacı olanlara taşımanın bir yolu var mı? Bu bolumde, bir şilebe bağlı dayanıklı plastikten uretilme yuzen bir torba olacak. İşe yarayacak mı?

programme.title: Bear Gryllsın Sunduğu Olağanustu Olmak: Yıldız (Julia Roberts) ve Dovuşçu (Wladimir Klitschko)
programme.desc: Bear Gryllsin sunduğu Olağanustu Olmakın bu bolumunde, Julia Roberts, Oscar odullu bir aktris olma yolculuğunu yeniden yaşıyor ve Wladimir Klitschko nasıl Olimpiyat altın madalyası sahibi ve rekor kıran dunya ağır sıklet boks şampiyonu olduğunu paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Ekstrem Risklerle Yuzleşme
programme.desc: Bir deprem yada tsunami durumunda, bunların nukleer reaktor ve kimyasal yapılar gibi kritik yapılar uzerindeki etkisi nedir? STREST projesinin bilimadamları, felaketleri simule etmek ve yapılar uzerindeki etkilerini test etmek için dijital aletler kullanıyorlar.

programme.title: Futuris: Akıllı Hayvan Çiftliği
programme.desc: Algortimler nasıl domuzların sağlığını arttırırabilir? Scientists of the EU-PLF projesinin araştırmacıları bu sorunun cevabını aramakta ve çiftçilerin buyukbaşlarının sağlık durumlarını kontrol edebilmeleri için sofistike bir platfom geliştirdiler.

programme.title: Bear Gryllsın Sunduğu Olağanustu Olmak: Kaleci (Maddie Hinch) ve Kâşif (Ranulph Fiennes)
programme.desc: Bear Gryllsin sunduğu Olağanustu Olmakın bu bolumunde, dunyanın en iyi çim hokeyi kalecisi ve Olimpiyat altın madalyası sahibi Maddie Hinch ve dunyanın yaşayan en buyuk kaşifi Ranulph Fiennes, rekor kıran yolculuklarını paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Seyyar Sera
programme.desc: Zephyr projesinin bilimadamları ormanları sıfır etki ve uygun maliyetle yeşertecek olan birmobil-sera geliştiriyorlar. Bu "mobil orman çocuk yuvası" doğa uzerinde beklenen pozitif etkiyi yaratacak mı?

programme.title: Futuris: Meşgul Dahi ve Koruyucu Robotlar
programme.desc: Eşekarıları, eşekler, ve şahinler sadece hayvan değillerdir: onlar insanları Alpler gibi tehlikeli ortamlardan kurtarabilmek için dizayn edilmiş robotlardır. Bu bolumde, bu prototiplerin test edildiği İtalyadaki Aosta Vadisine gideceğiz.

programme.title: Bilgisayarlar İçin Gosteri Zamanı: Android Lloyd Webber
programme.desc: Bir grup bilim insanı bir muzikali iyi yapan şeyi araştırıyor ve bir bilgisayar programı olan Android Lloyd Webberı yaratıyorlar. Ardından bu bilgisayar yaratıcılığı deneyi için besteciler ve aktorlerle çalışıyorlar.

programme.title: Futuris: Global Gozlem
programme.desc: Bol ve yetiştirmesi kolay olan mikroalgler, surdurulebilir besin ve gıda olmayan urunler için umut veren bir besleme stoğu olma yolunda. Bu bolumde mevcut teknolojilere goz atmak için İspanya, Portekiz ve Holandaya gidiyoruz.

programme.title: Harika Gezegen: Hayvan Kurtarma
programme.desc: Sunucu Philippe Cousteau Jr, Vancouverdaki bir deniz memelileri merkezine ve yasadışı olarak yakalanan jibonların kurtarıldığı Taylanda gidiyor. Yolculuk, Yeni Zelandada bir ailenin işlettiği, nesli tukenen kivi kuşlarına yardım edilen kurtarma merkezinde sonlanıyor.

programme.desc: Dunyanın en inanılmaz doğal oluşumları keşfederken, sunucu Philippe Cousteau Juniora katılın. Fijideki farklı mercan turlerine bakacağız. Kanada Rocky Dağlarındaki uzak bir buzulu ziyaret edeceğiz ve Utah çolunun kemerlerini hayretle seyredeceğiz.

programme.title: Yenilik: The Future Is: Hands-free Driving
programme.desc: Avrupalı bilim insanları ve girişimciler tarafından geliştirilen muthiş heyecan verici urunlere goz atın. Enerji tasarruflu lambadan laboratuvarda uretilen kalp kapakçığına, su altı yolculuğundan uzaktan kumandalı robot itfaiyeciye, her şey var.

programme.title: Yenilik

programme.title: Harika Gezegen: Spor ve Çevre
programme.desc: Sporun ve çevremizin kesiştiği noktadayız. Dağlarımızı korumayı amaçlayan Olimpik bir snowboardcuyla tanışıyoruz. Ardından profesyonel bir sorfçunun çocuklara okyanuslarımızı ve plajlarımızı temiz tutmanın onemini oğrettiği Hawaiiye gidiyoruz.

programme.title: Harika Gezegen: Kaşif Öğrenci
programme.desc: Bu bolumde, ikinci KaşifÖğrenci Yarışmamızın kazananını açıklıyoruz. Philippe ve şanslı oğrenci daha sonra yunuslar, dalışlar ve bir mercan resifi restorasyon projesinde yer almak için Fijiye gidiyor.

programme.title: Yenilik
programme.desc: Avrupalı bilim insanları ve girişimciler tarafından geliştirilen muthiş heyecan verici urunlere goz atın. Enerji tasarruflu lambadan laboratuvarda uretilen kalp kapakçığına, su altı yolculuğundan uzaktan kumandalı robot itfaiyeciye, her şey var.

programme.title: Yenilik: A Robot In Mind
programme.desc: Avrupalı bilim insanları ve girişimciler tarafından geliştirilen muthiş heyecan verici urunlere goz atın. Enerji tasarruflu lambadan laboratuvarda uretilen kalp kapakçığına, su altı yolculuğundan uzaktan kumandalı robot itfaiyeciye, her şey var.

programme.title: İcatlar Dunyası: Bovling ve Matematik
programme.desc: Alie Ward, akıllı telefona bağlanabilen bir video kapı zilini ve ve kendi kendini suren bir araç kitini anlatıyor. Bovling toplarının yerçekimini oğretmek için nasıl kullanılabileceğini ve Afrikada su taşımak için tasarlanmış bir su aygırı su silindirini keşfediyor.

programme.title: Futuris: İnsan_ Robot İşbirliği
programme.desc: Araştırmacılar endustriyel sektorde, muşteri ve sağlık hizmetlerinde gunluk olarak bizimle etkileşime girebilecek robotlar geliştiriyorlar.Test robotu iCub, sozlu talimatları algılaması için geliştiriliyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Gıda Teknolojisi
programme.desc: Vurgulu elektrik alanı (PEF) teknolojisi, zeytinyağı ve sirke uretimine yardımcı olmak için oluşturulan duşuk enerjili bir teknolojidir. Aynı teknolojinin bir çeşidi, mikropları oldurmek ve taze meyve suyunun raf omrunu artırmak için de kullanılabilir.

programme.title: İcatlar Dunyası: Bizimle Otur Uygulaması
programme.desc: Alie Ward okulda gençlerin oğle yemeği arkadaşları bulmasını sağlayan uygulamanın mucidiyle buluşuyor ve telefon şarj etmek için kullanılabilecek giyilebilir bir kumaş keşfediyor. Jetle çalışan bir sorf tahtasını ve çok kullanışlı robot kuşları tanıtıyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Sualtı Kameraları
programme.desc: Balıkları suyun altında çekebilecek ve izleyebilecek yeni su altı kameraları geliştiriliyor. Bunlar ayrıca, veri toplamak, sualtı kirliliğinin belirlenmesi ve deniz yatağında ki biyolojik çeşitliliği okuyan hayati araçlar olabilir.

programme.title: Futuris: Çevre Dostu Gemiler
programme.desc: Araştımacılar CO2 emisyonlarını % 25e kadar duşurecek, kukurt ve azot oksit gibi diğer kirleticileri tamamen ortadan kaldırmak için tasarlanmış, daha az kirlilik yaratacak gemiler geliştiriyor.

programme.title: Bilimi Kendin Yap: Kendin Yap Projesi Oyuncakları
programme.desc: Steve Spangler oyuncak yapmak için bilimi nasıl kullanabileceğinizi gosteriyor, gizmeli bir kutu kendi kendine hareket ediyor. İnanılmaz baloncuklar yapıyor.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News is news and information channel from a German international broadcaster Deutsche Well (German Wall). It provides latest news from Europe and all around the world in several languages on a daily basis. DW news is informative, entertaining, up-to-date and what is more important, reliable source of news.

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: The news as it happened, presented, clarified and analysed by experts and specialists. Studio-based and in-the field summaries and analysis of the events to have marked the previous twenty-four hours enable understanding and place within a wider context the issues that have shaped, focused and given direction over the course of the previous day.

programme.title: Arts Unveiled: Experiencing and understanding the art world
programme.desc: The Campus Project for the 2025 Beethovenfest focuses on Nigeria and Afrobeat, South African artist William Kentridge uses his creative work to fight apartheid and colonialism, and in London, the world is still hand-made _ in form of artsy globes!

programme.title: Son Alaskalılar

programme.desc: Duvar yıkan, bomba soken ve uçakları parçalayan Polonyalı iş adamları, zorlu hurda metal işinden buyuk paralar kazanırlar.

programme.title: Hurda Avcıları: Klasik Arabalar
programme.desc: Tamir tutkunu Drew Pritchard, Paul Cowland ile birlikte bir otomobil seruvenine çıkıyor. Birleşik Krallıkı gezerek klasik araçları alarak restore edip satarlar.

programme.title: Tamirat Tadilat
programme.desc: Mike Amerika giderek en kolay tanınabilen ve en mustesna bir araba olan De Loreanı arıyor. Edd bu arabayı yenileyip kârlarını maksimize edebilir mi acaba?.

programme.title: Kindig Garajı
programme.desc: Uzun suredir elektrikli otomobil dunyasına adım atmak isteyen Dave, işe kendi CF1lerinden başlamaya karar verir.

programme.title: Çifte Turbo
programme.desc: Deberti ekibi bir 2018 Mustang yapımını tamamlamak için zamanla yarışıyor. Ve SEMA showda gerçekleşen bir tesaduf hızlı bir şekilde Bradin yarış kariyerini başlatabilir.

programme.title: Goblin Works Garajı
programme.desc: Jimmy deVille motor sporları efsanesi bir Escort Mk2 rally arabası uzerinde çalışıyor. Jimmy passız bir Guney Afrika ithal arabası bulunca ekip bu sipariş yapıma hayran kalıyor.

programme.title: Nasıl Yapılmış?
programme.desc: Daha da fazla gundelik eşya yakın plana alınırken, pistonların, yuvarlak boya fırçalarının, paraşutlerin ve bacaların nasıl yapıldığını oğreniyoruz.

programme.title: Ufak Tefek Evler
programme.desc: ABDde ev arayanlar konut boyutlarında ciddi bir kuçulmeyi tercih ediyor! Mukemmel bir kompakt evi seçmeden once 57 metrekarenin altındaki uç kuçuk konutu gormeye gidiyorlar.

programme.title: Doğuştan Usta
programme.desc: Ant tamiri yarıda bırakılmış bir Volkswagen motokaravan bulur. İç doşemelerin tumuyle değişmesi ve suspansiyonun yenilenmesi gerekir.

programme.title: Nasıl Yapılır?
programme.desc: Kanallarda teknelerin ve altı duz mavunaların tepelere tırmanabilmelerini sağlayacak havuz kapıları nasıl yapılır? Tayvanın unlu kopuklu çayının içine kopukler nasıl konur?.

programme.title: Nasıl Yapılmış?
programme.desc: Araba tamponları, şeker çubukları (İngilterede rock denir), ışık filtreleri, kamera filtreleri ve buharlı modeller mercek altına alınan gundelik objelerden sadece bazıları.

programme.title: İşte Surat İşte Ses
programme.desc: Aaron tatildeyken, Richard ekibe, ta lisedeyken aldığı ilk arabası kusmuk yeşili 74 Mercury Comete guzel bir Gas Monkey muamelesi çektiriyor.

programme.title: Öfkeli Suruculer
programme.desc: Öfkeli bir surucu, bir binaya çarpar. New Jerseyli suruculer işe gitmeye çalışır. Kızgın bir adam, bir motosikletçiye saldırır.

programme.title: Öfkeli Suruculer
programme.desc: Kamyoncular, ofkeli suruculerle kavga eder. Genç bir adam, kızgın bir surucuden canını kurtarmaya çalışır. Bir kadın, başka bir surucuyu kovalar.

programme.title: Gumruk Kontrol: İtalya
programme.desc: Guvenlik ve Gumruk Hizmetleri memurları, uyuşturucu, silah ve şupheli teroristlerin daimi tehdidi altındaki İtalya sınırlarını korurlar.

programme.title: Polis Kamerası
programme.desc: New Mexicoda bir kamyonu kenara çeken polis memuru kamyona yaklaşınca silahlar patlar. Ohioda polisler silah zoruyla rehin alınan bir kişinin bulunduğu evin etrafını sarar.

programme.title: Yabanda 100 Gun
programme.desc: Kuçuk bir grup, Alaskanın Tanana Vadisinde, medeniyetten 320 km uzakta yeni bir hayat kurmaya çalışıyor. Kutup Dairesi buzlarla kaplanmadan once grubun sadece 100 gunu var.

programme.title: Hurda Avcıları: Tamirat
programme.desc: Fransız cila ustası Alex, Tudor tarzındaki dort direkli bir karyolanın parçalarını birleştirmeye çalışır. Drew, heykeltıraş Nickten bir çift dekoratif konsolu kurtarmasını ister.

programme.title: Uyumsuzlar Garajı
programme.desc: Bizimkiler 1964 GMC kamyonu tamamlamaya çalışıyorken John Klump ve ekibi yedek parça sorunu ile meşgul. Tom ile tuttuğu kilo verme bahsini kazanan Richard parasını almaya geliyor.

programme.title: Öfkeli Suruculer
programme.desc: Öfkeli bir surucu, bir binaya çarpar. New Jerseyli suruculer işe gitmeye çalışır. Kızgın bir adam, bir motosikletçiye saldırır.

programme.title: Öfkeli Suruculer
programme.desc: Kamyoncular, ofkeli suruculerle kavga eder. Genç bir adam, kızgın bir surucuden canını kurtarmaya çalışır. Bir kadın, başka bir surucuyu kovalar.

programme.title: Gumruk Kontrol: İtalya
programme.desc: Guvenlik ve Gumruk Hizmetleri memurları, uyuşturucu, silah ve şupheli teroristlerin daimi tehdidi altındaki İtalya sınırlarını korurlar.

programme.title: Tamirat Tadilat
programme.desc: Mike tek kişilik bir Isetta buluyor. Yarı araba, yarı motosiklet olan bu klasik aracı surmek bir zevk ama tamiri hiç oyle değil! Edd ile Mike bundan kâr edebilecekler mi acaba?.

programme.title: Hurda Avcıları: Tamirat
programme.desc: Atari oyunları uzmanı Mark Squires 1960lardan kalma bir pinball makinasını kurtarır. Doşeme ustası Craig yaratıcılığıyla yuzyıl ortasından kalma bir G koltuğu hayata dondurur.

programme.title: Unutulmuş Hazineler
programme.desc: Henry ve Fuzz, bir klasik motosiklet koleksiyonu olan Robu ziyaret eder. Bir BSA Bantam ve 1930lardan kalma bir Austin Ten otomobili bulurlar.

programme.title: Unutulmuş Hazineler
programme.desc: Henry ve Fuzz, bir Honda 750 Four da dahil olmak uzere çok iyi muhafaza edilmiş bir Japon motosiklet koleksiyonuna sahip olan Paulu ziyaret eder.

programme.title: Tamirat Tadilat
programme.desc: Mark ve Elvis nesli tukenmekte olan ikonik V8 motorunun hakkını vermek için kolları sıvarlar. Mercedes marka klasik bir spor araba, SL55, bu iş için biçilmiş kaftandır.

programme.title: Savaş Barkçin İle Medeniyet Aklı
programme.desc: Savaş Barkçin, Biz kimiz?, Yerimiz neresi?, Nereden geliyoruz? gibi sorulara farklı bir bakış açısı ile cevap vermeyi amaçlıyor.

programme.title: Dini Gundem
programme.desc: Toplumda polemik yaratan, halkın kafasını karıştıran, bilgi kirliliğine sebep olan durumlar her yerde. Yanlış anlaşılması muhtemel, açıklanmasını istediğiniz konular her an karşımızda...Hayatımızda birden bire ortaya çıkan ve karşılığını bulamadığımız sorunlar var.Peki, doğruyu nasıl bulacağız? Kafa karışıklığı nasıl son bulacak? Dini Gundem ile tum sorularınız cevap buluyor. Diyanet İşleri Başkanlığı Din İşleri Yuksek Kurulu uye ve uzmanları ile merak ettiğiniz her konuya, Kur’an, sunnet ve sahih İslam geleneğinin rehberliğinde açıklık getiriyoruz.

programme.desc: Eşya bize ne soyler?Harf neden harf, yazı neden yazıdır?Sıradan gorduğumuz şeyler hangi derinlikleri saklar?Mehmet Aycı ve Emin Gurdamur, entelektuel bir bakışla, yaz defterinin sayfalarına kultur hayatımıza dair farklı, ilginç ve zengin dipnotlar duşuyor.

programme.title: 5 Vakit Yolda
programme.desc: 5 Vakit Yolda, yaşamın izlerini ekrana taşıyor.

programme.title: Guncel Dini Meseleler
programme.desc: Toplumun karşılaştığı dini soruların geniş bir bakış açısıyla cevaplandığı programın her bolumunde guncel bir dini mesele ele alınıyor.

programme.title: Edebi
programme.desc: Edebi programında Divan edebiyatından aşıklığa Anadolu medeniyetindeki eserler ve şairler anlatılırken merhamet, dostluk, sabır, tevazu gibi iyiliği vurgulayan konular ele alınıyor.Ankara Mevlevihanesinden ekranlara gelen programda, Dr. Ömer Demirbağ ve Dr. Emrah Gokçe her hafta farklı bir konuyla evlerinize konuk oluyor.

programme.title: Ecdadın Emaneti Ayasofya Camileri
programme.desc: Bazen şehrin en buyuk camisi, bazen fethin nişanesi, ulkemizin dort bir yanından Ayasofyaya nazire olarak bu şekilde isimlendirilen Ayasofya camilerinin tarihi ve kulturel değerleri konu alınıyor.

programme.title: Helal Kazancın Alınteri
programme.desc: Turkiyenin dort bir yanından, her yaştan Alın Teri hikayeleri Helal kazanç peşinde bir omur akıtılan alın terlerinin meşakkatli yolculuğu. Her bolumde sıcak ve insani duygular, mutlak tevekkul ile uretime değer katanlar Helal Kazancın Alın Terinde.

programme.title: Kabenin Yolları
programme.desc: Kutsal topraklara hac veya umre yapmak için giden kişilerin manevi yolculuklarında yaşadıkları hatıraları “Kâbe’nin Yolları” adlı programda izleyiciyle buluşuyor.

programme.title: Aile Zamanı
programme.desc: Aile ve dini rehberlik burolarına gelen sorular dini, sahih ve guvenilir bilgiler ışığında cevaplanıyor. Gundelik pratikler uzerinden hayat tecrubeleri de paylaşılıyor.Sunumunu Betul Erbaş’ın yaptığı programda sizlerden gelen sorulara hem saha tecrubesi hem ilmi birikimi ile Zehra Tuncel Hoca cevap veriyor.

programme.title: Cuma Sevinci Vaaz
programme.desc: Cuma namazı ile namazın ardından verilen Cuma hutbesi ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Osmanlı Padişahları
programme.desc: Medeniyetimizi ve kulturumuzu ilmek ilmek işleyen ve onlara buyuk bir kimlik kazandıran Osmanlı Padişahları çizginin birleştirici gucu ile ekranlara geliyor.

programme.title: Anadolunun İzleri
programme.desc: Sabır, vefa, durustluk gibi kavramları yaşamlarında tatbik eden, Anadolu irfanı ile yoğrulmuş kişilerin yaşam oykusu konu alınıyor.

programme.title: Din Hizmetine Adanmış Ömurler
programme.desc: Turkiyenin çeşitli yerlerinde Diyanet İşleri Başkanlığı bunyesinde uzun yıllar gorev yapmış, emekli din gorevlilerimizin hayat hikayeleri ekrana geliyor.

programme.desc: Gunumuz dunyasını oluşturan pek çok nesne çok karmaşık muhendislik ve imalat sureçlerinin urunudur. Bu eşyalar nasıl uretiliyor acaba?.

programme.title: Dream 10
programme.desc: 10 numaradan zirveye heyecanlı bir geri sayım! Onur Kırışın sunumuyla Dream 10, her gun 12.00de ve 19.00da Dream Turkte!

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Ding Dang Dong
programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV seeks to create content that is both engaging and fun, but also educational. This makes learning new things fun and easy!

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. Dance is an excellent way to develop young viewers musical skills, the sense of rhythm and even their listening skills, setting them up for a bright future. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: As is the case with many Duck TV programmes, this programme is designed to both educate and entertain its young audience. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends

The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy 2
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy are here to introduce little children to the concept of rhythm. The familiar duo go on many exciting adventures in which they encounter amazing animals who help them explore the wonderful world of rhythm through their clapping and tapping.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! This sharpens the sense of hearing and nurtures any musical skills, aiding child development. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content that is both educational and entertaining.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The protagonists of The Shapies introduce us to the world of shapes through their adventures. They show us where they fit in, what things they resemble, how they transform if they are together and how they make up entire stories.

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.desc: Animated childrens series following Cubie the builder who has fantastic plans for new buildings. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Doll Team
programme.desc: This cartoon is both incredibly entertaining, and educational. In accompanying these three friends, your child will learn social skills, and friendship. The trio that will take you on this journey are Bell, the sweetest flower-doll, Lilo, the cuddly teddy bear, and Fido, the incredibly playful kangaroo. The three friends are determined to help the inhabitants of the undergrowth however they can.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo PLUS
programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Dinoland
programme.desc: Go on adventures with four adorable baby dinosaurs as they explore their environment and work together to solve tricky problems. Helping young viewers to develop their initial problem solving and decision making skills as well as developing their social skills makes Dinoland the perfect combination of fun and learning. Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: The Ducky family has a brand new member! With the arrival of her little brother Fluffy, Ducky experiences a wide range of new emotions and finds herself in new situations. Stories are created with the support of child psychologists to help children adjust to the arrival of a new sibling.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. programme.title: Safari

It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. Aimed at the littlest of viewers, this show includes the classic educational values of Duck TV, helping the development of motor skills and sensory activity. But most importantly, Bathroom helps it little viewers to befriend bath time, showing them how much fun a bath can be!

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. Aimed at the littlest of viewers, this show includes the classic educational values of Duck TV, helping the development of motor skills and sensory activity. But most importantly, Bathroom helps it little viewers to befriend bath time, showing them how much fun a bath can be!

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby

programme.title: Oli - The Cycles of Nature
programme.desc: Give your child a head start, in a way thats fun and exciting, too. Oli the elephant will teach your child to identify objects and their uses in everyday life, develop their thinking and observational skills, and also he will promote an interest in nature. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid the development of young children.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Ding Dang Dong
programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends

They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Monica and Rudy 2
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy are here to introduce little children to the concept of rhythm. The familiar duo go on many exciting adventures in which they encounter amazing animals who help them explore the wonderful world of rhythm through their clapping and tapping.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. programme.title: Nature Dudes

Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Fireteam

programme.title: Cubie
programme.desc: Animated childrens series following Cubie the builder who has fantastic plans for new buildings. Cubie loves to build and, with help from his friends, the cheerful cubes, erects inventive new constructions. This enjoyable series from Duck TV helps children build their spatial awareness and observational skills while learning about new prepositions and the basics of building.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Gun Ortası
programme.desc: Ekonominin sıcak gelişmeleri neler? Turkiye ve dunyada neler oluyor? Enflasyondan faize, para ve sermaye piyasalarından uretim ve tuketime kadar ekonomiye dair her ne varsa Gun Ortasında.

programme.title: Beklenti Raporu
programme.desc: Gunun ekonomik takviminde neler var? Gunun one çıkan haberleri neler? İç ve dış kuresel piyasalardaki son gelişmeler ve beklentiler neler?

programme.title: İlk Seans
programme.desc: Yurt içi ve yurt dışı gelişmeler, Borsa İstanbul açılışını nasıl etkileyecek? Açılış itibariyle hangi hisseler en fazla yukselip hangi hisseler değer kaybedecek? Gunun one çıkan şirket haberleri ve daha fazlası İlk Seansta.

programme.title: Araştırma Masası
programme.desc: Özel konuklar, yatırım uzmanları ve analistler "Araştırma Masası"nda aktuel ekonomi konularda konuşuyor.

programme.title: Gun Ortası
programme.desc: Ekonominin sıcak gelişmeleri neler? Turkiye ve dunyada neler oluyor? Enflasyondan faize, para ve sermaye piyasalarından uretim ve tuketime kadar ekonomiye dair her ne varsa Gun Ortasında.

programme.title: Borsa Teknik
programme.desc: Yurt içi ve yurt dışı makro ekonomik veriler ve gelişmeler ne anlama geliyor? Ekonomik ve politik gelişmelerin finansal piyasalara olan yansımasını Perihan Tantuğ yorumluyor.

programme.title: Sektorel Bakış
programme.desc: Şirketler, pandemi sonrası doneme nasıl hazırlanıyor? Yeni yılda yeni yatırımlar gundemde mi? Şirketlerin yurt dışı planları neler? Sektorel Bakış programı Ekoturkte.

programme.title: Paratoner
programme.desc: Borsa İstanbulda işlemler bu programla başlıyor. Murat Tufan finans dunyasının uzmanlarıyla zorlu piyasa koşullarında hızla değişen rakamları sade ve anlaşılır bir dille Paratoner programında izleyiciler için yorumluyor.

programme.title: Gun Sonu
programme.desc: Yurt içi ve kuresel piyasalar gunu nasıl tamamlıyor? Gelecek gunden beklentiler neler? Gunun tum konuşulanlarını, yarının gundemini Özlem Karakullukçu, konukları ve muhabirleri ile değerlendiriyor. Özlem Karakullukçu ile Gun Sonu, hafta içi her gun saat 16:30da Ekoturkte!

programme.title: Son Seans
programme.desc: Gunun sonu yaklaşırken, kuresel piyasalar gunu nasıl tamamlıyor? Ekonomik ve siyasi gelişmeler yarına nasıl yansıyacak? Ertesi gun borsalar nasıl tepki verecek? Gunden geceye kalanlar gelecek gunden beklentiler Ali Çağatayın sunduğu Son Seaansta…

programme.title: Araştırma Masası

programme.title: Gun Ortası
programme.desc: Ekonominin sıcak gelişmeleri neler? Turkiye ve dunyada neler oluyor? Enflasyondan faize, para ve sermaye piyasalarından uretim ve tuketime kadar ekonomiye dair her ne varsa Gun Ortasında.

programme.title: Son Seans

programme.desc: Going to the cinema to watch a good movie, the audience is mainly focused on the acting and the plot of the film. However, our character was thinking about something completely different! Lets find out his story.

programme.title: Art Land: Dolphin
programme.desc: Did you know that you can create pictures not only with paints? Plasticine, sand, flour, and even… shaving cream _ all of these can be used to create masterpieces of childrens art.

programme.title: Art Land: Picture of the universe
programme.desc: You will learn how to make a beautiful end simple picture using unusual techniques with your child. Take some plasticine, paints, cocktail straws _ and well end up with a picture of the universe.

programme.title: Crafty Hands: Doll
programme.desc: Little inventors will be able to enrich their vocabulary and make a toy for their very own collection. In this episode, were going to make a doll.

programme.title: Okey-Dokey: Vegetables
programme.desc: Okey-Dokey is a fun and engaging programme for children ages 2 to 7. Its a musical show that invites children to sing elementary English songs and at the same time learn the language.

programme.title: Bayan Scarlet
programme.desc: Dukun aylar suren yokluğunda yeni bir başkomiser polis kaynakları karşılığında Eliza Scarletı yoğun bir iş temposuna sokar. Tum bu değişiklikler bir soruyu gundeme getirir, Eliza istediği her şeye sahip olabilecek mi?

programme.title: Buyuk Kuçuk Tum Hayvanlar
programme.desc: James Herriot Yorshire Vadisinde bir veteriner olma hayalinin peşinden gider; hayvanları tedavi etmenin aslında sahiplerini tedavi etmek anlamına geldiğini keşfeder ve çiftçileri memnun etmek zordur.

programme.title: Bayan Scarlet Ve Duk
programme.desc: 1850ler: korkusuz ve sorgulayıcı Bayan Scarlet rahmetli babasının dedektiflik burosunu Mufettiş Wellington (Duk), temizlikçi Ivy ve deneyimli duzenbaz Mosesın yardımları ile idare eder.

programme.title: Gece Haberi
programme.desc: FB TVde Gece Haberi Turkiyenin ve dunyadaki en onemli haberleri ekranlarınıza taşınıyor...

programme.title: Analiz Fenerbahçe
programme.desc: Ersin Sezerin sunduğu Analiz Fenerbahçe sports magazinesi bu futbol kulubunun tum hayranları için bundan boyle FB TVde.

programme.title: Soz Taraftarda
programme.desc: Fenerbahçemizin ve Turk Futbolunun gundemini, yapacağımız maçların skorlarını Buyuk Fenerbahçe Taraftarına sorduğumuz Soz Taraftarda programının bolumlerinde.

programme.title: Futbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turkiye Super Ligi, Turkiyenin en yuksek profesyonel futbol ligidir. Bu lig 1957de kuruldu ve şu anda 18 kulupten oluşuyor. Puan tablosunu birinci sırada tamamlayan takım, UEFA Şampiyonlar Ligi grup aşamasına doğrudan yerleşiyor.

programme.title: Sportif
programme.desc: Fenerbahçe spor takımlarını tum yonleriyle ekranlara getiren "Sportif" programı FB TV ekranlarında yayınlanıyor. Futboldan voleybola, atletizmden yuzmeye kadar her alanda faaliyet gosteren Fenerbahçenin Turk sporuna olan katkıları değerlendiriliyor.

programme.title: Gunun Roportajı
programme.desc: Sıcak ve en onemli spor haberleri her Gunun Roportajı programımızda bulabilirsiniz.. Programımızda sporla ilgili tum guncel olayları takip edin. Fenerbahçe Televizyon da sizlerle.

programme.title: Basketbol: Euroleague
programme.desc: EuroLeague, sponsorluk adıyla Turkish Airlines EuroLeague, Avrupada 2000den beri Euroleague Basketball tarafından duzenlenen en ust duzeydeki ve kazananın Avrupa Şampiyonu olarak adlandırıldığı uluslararası profesyonel basketbol turnuvası

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiyede ve dunyada yaşanan onemli gelişmelerin ayrıntıları izleyiciye taşınıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, spordan sanata, gundemi oluşturan haberlerin aktarıldığı programda, hava-yol durumu guncellemeleri de ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Tarihte Bugun
programme.desc: Futbol tarihinin en iyi hamleleri hakkında bir program. Futbol geçmişindeki en guzel anlardan bazılarını, en iyi futbolcuları ve oyundaki başyapıtlarını hatırlayarak.

programme.title: Basketbol: Kadınlar Super Ligi
programme.desc: Basketbol Super Ligi, sponsorluk adıyla ING Basketbol Super Ligi, 1966 yılında Turkiye Basketbol Federasyonu tarafından kurulan ve Turkiyedeki en ust duzey profesyonel basketbol ligi. Normal lig karşılamaları, 16 takım arasında, her takımın biri kendi sahasında diğeri rakip takımın sahasında olmak uzere deplasmanlı, iki devreli ve lig usulu oynanır.

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiyede ve dunyada yaşanan onemli gelişmelerin ayrıntıları izleyiciye taşınıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, spordan sanata, gundemi oluşturan haberlerin aktarıldığı programda, hava-yol durumu guncellemeleri de ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Soz Taraftarda
programme.desc: Fenerbahçemizin ve Turk Futbolunun gundemini, yapacağımız maçların skorlarını Buyuk Fenerbahçe Taraftarına sorduğumuz Soz Taraftarda programının bolumlerinde.

programme.title: Basketbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiyede ve dunyada yaşanan onemli gelişmelerin ayrıntıları izleyiciye taşınıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, spordan sanata, gundemi oluşturan haberlerin aktarıldığı programda, hava-yol durumu guncellemeleri de ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Maç Başlıyor
programme.desc: Futbol dunyanın en onemli yan çizgisidir. Bugunku maçı kaçırmayın. Futbol maçının yayını birazdan başlayacak. Fenerbahçe Tvde heyecan dolu maçları hep sizlerle..

programme.title: Maç Havası
programme.desc: FB tvde yayımlanan bir program. İki sunucu maç yorumu yapıyorlar eş zamanlı ve maçı anlatıyorlar. Maç Havası, Maç Gunu, yeni şampiyonlar ligi Futbol topları gelmiştir, maç sonrası ikramlarımız ile maçlarımız devam ediyor...

programme.title: Maçın Ardından
programme.desc: Futbol dunyanın en onemli yan çizgisidir. En son spor haberlerini kaçırmayın. Maçın Ardından ile ilgili haber sonuçları TRT Sporda. Maçla ilgili en onemli yorumları ve olayları ekranlarınızda sunarız.
